about: I am a passionate and driven B.Tech student at SRKR Engineering College, with a strong foundation in Java, SQL, Python, React JS, and Django. I possess a deep interest in full-stack development, demonstrated through certifications in Full Stack Development and MERN Stack. Alongside my technical skills, I excel in communication, teamwork, and time management. My extracurricular activities include reading books, playing badminton, and engaging in coding challenges on platforms like HackerRank and GeeksforGeeks. Fluent in English and Telugu, I aim to continuously expand my knowledge and skills in technology.
